description: An amazing start, there are hardly any CAD Drawing Suites available on Linux. Great GUI and layout, while still in its early stages it looks very promising. DXF compatible so you can continue drawings on AutoCAD!
summary: Great option on Linux for Orthographics,

description: The application is designed good and minimalistic, but it would be nice if someone on developement team works on measurement unit, layer s, line type, and the the most important drawing exprience like the user should see the lenght and angle of the lines and should be able to input those values wile drawing. and don't forget to work on array and hatch as well.

summary: I don't know how any of these work

description: I really like the simplicity of the app but missing offset feature and trim feature is very confusing to use. Apart from that if we close a drawing which is not saved, there is no prompt to save it, it just quits. Overall I am so happy to see a CAD program built with GTK.
The app is very promising and needs to be supported.
Great start and this needs to be supported! Keep it up!
Nice app - I like interface, cleanlines, but not many tools at the moment: no scale, no dimensions etc. Hope it will grow larger
I like it so much! I hope you can add more features soon!
summary: I've waited for something like this!
